greetingPrompt.promptText: Thank you for calling Eastern Vascular Associates at Montifore Medical Center, If this is a medical emergency, please hang up and dial 911 or go to the nearest emergency room

prompts.promptText: if you are a patient press 1, if you are a provider press 2

transferPrompt.promptText: Please stay on the line while we connect to our associate. Your call may be monitored and recorded for quality assurance

prompts.promptText: if you are a new patient calling to schedule an appointment press 1, For the address and directions press 2, for all other matters press 3 or remain on the line for assistance

transferPrompt.promptText: Please stay on the line while we connect to our associate. Your call may be monitored and recorded for quality assurance

prompt.promptText: We are location at 3219 Tremont Avenue Between Waterbury and Puritan Avenue. If you are coming by bus, take the #40 or #42 bus to Waterbury Avenue, if by train, take the #6 to Westchester Square folled by the #40 or #42 bus going North East towards Waterbury Avenue. To repeat this information press 1, to return to the main menu, press the start key.

transferPrompt.promptText: Please stay on the line while we connect to our associate. Your call may be monitored and recorded for quality assurance
